system.requirement: After you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.b643d9ea53ff8d98]{Forge a Bond} with an Eagle Warrior and they agree to train you...

abilities.description: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.c8bacc17f73d3103]{Face Danger} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4dd8468e095810a4]{Secure an Advantage} +heart by displaying exceptional and unwavering courage, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.ed343c963b08f301]{Enter the Fray} +heart against a foe (formidable or less) while wearing full battle regalia, add +1. On a strong hit, add +1 to all moves you make in the fight until you lose the initiative. On a weak hit, add +1 only to your next move.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4244b77103f55bc4]{Gather Information} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4dd8468e095810a4]{Secure an Advantage} by observing from a high place or relying on acute vision, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
